name: URichTextBlock
doc:
The rich text block

* Fancy Text
* No Children

bOverrideDefaultStyle: True to specify the default text style for this rich text inline, overriding any default provided in the style set table
DefaultTextStyleOverride: Text style to apply by default to text in this block
MinDesiredWidth: The minimum desired size for the text
TextTransformPolicy: The text transformation policy to apply to this text block
TextOverflowPolicy: Sets what happens to text that is clipped and doesn't fit within the clip rect for this widget

methods.name: ClearAllDefaultStyleOverrides
methods.doc: Remove all overrides made to the default text style and return to the style specified in the style set data table

methods.name: GetDefaultDynamicMaterial
methods.doc:
Creates a dynamic material for the default font or returns it if it already
exists

methods.name: RefreshTextLayout
methods.doc: Causes the text to reflow it's layout and re-evaluate any decorators

methods.name: SetAutoWrapText
methods.doc:
Set the auto wrap for this rich text block
@param InAutoTextWrap to turn wrap on or off

methods.name: SetDecorators
methods.doc: Replaces the existing decorators with the list provided

methods.name: SetDefaultColorAndOpacity
methods.doc:
Sets the color and opacity of the default text in this rich text block
@param InColorAndOpacity             The new text color and opacity

methods.name: SetDefaultFont
methods.doc:
Dynamically set the default font info for this rich text block
@param InFontInfo The new font info

methods.name: SetDefaultShadowColorAndOpacity
SetDefaultShadowOffset
methods.doc:
Sets the offset that the default text drop shadow should be drawn at
@param InShadowOffset                The new offset

methods.name: SetDefaultStrikeBrush
methods.doc:
Dynamically set the default strike brush for this rich text block
@param InStrikeBrush The new brush to use to strike through text

methods.name: SetDefaultTextStyle
methods.doc:
Wholesale override of the currently established default text style
@param InDefaultTextStyle The new text style to apply to all default (i.e. undecorated) text in the block

methods.name: SetMinDesiredWidth
methods.doc:
Set the minimum desired width for this rich text block
@param InMinDesiredWidth new minimum desired width

methods.name: SetText
SetTextOverflowPolicy
methods.doc:
Set the text overflow policy for this text block.
@param InOverflowPolicy the new text overflow policy.

methods.name: SetTextTransformPolicy
methods.doc:
Set the text transformation policy for this text block.
@param InTransformPolicy the new text transformation policy.
